summary: Karan and Arjun reincarnate in the different parts of the country. But the faith of their previous mother brings them together in order to avenge their death.
cast: Rakhee Gulzar|Salman Khan|Shah Rukh Khan|Amrish Puri|Kajol|Mamta Kulkarni|Ranjeet|Johnny Lever|Arjun|Ashok Saraf|Aasif Sheikh|Ila Arun|Kishore Anand Bhanushali|Suresh Chatwal|Salim Khan Ding-Dong|John Gabriel|Jack Gaud|Dinesh Hingoo|Kirron Kher|Raj Kishore|Anil Nagrath|Gavin Packard|Ghanshyam Rohera|Babbanlal Yadav|Sunita|Yusuf
title: Karan Arjun
